metadata.title: CVE-2022-24122 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high
metadata.description: kernel/ucount.c in the Linux kernel 5.14 through 5.16.4, when unprivilegeduser namespaces are enabled, allows a use-after-free and privilegeescalation because a ucounts object can outlive its namespace.

criterions.comment: linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
